name: House of Thyme 3D
description:
Explore the mysteries of a house corrupted with mutated vegetation, in glorious 4-color 3D!

Made for the GBJAM-10 with Unreal Engine 5.

Controls:
Z - Interact
X - Hold to strafe
Arrow Keys - Move
Enter - Pause
Backspace - Inventory

Credits:
All But Music: Tim Leonard
Music: Angelo Stanca (https://soundcloud.com/angelostanca)
